queriesList.LOGIN: SELECT clientID, extranetUsername, extranetPassword FROM client WHERE extranetUsername = ? AND extranetPassword = ? AND isdeleted != 1
queriesList.INSERT_CLIENTS_DATA: INSERT INTO client (name, sex, nameFather, emailFather, docFather, cpfFather, nameMother, emailMother,docMother, cpfMother, address, phone1, phone2, phone3, city, state, zip, birthMother, clientID, extranetUsername, extranetPassword,enfermeiraID,coletaFeitaPor,obstetraID,hospitalID,dataColeta,dataCrioPreservacao,procPesoInicialUnidade,procViabilidadeCelular,procCd45Cd34Fim,bioArchiveID,cult_micro_bacteria,cult_micro_fungo, enfermeiraCoren, obstetraCRM) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
queriesList.UPDATE_CLIENT_DATA: UPDATE client SET name = ? , sex = ? , nameFather = ? , emailFather = ? , docFather = ? , cpfFather = ?, nameMother = ? , emailMother = ? ,docMother = ? , cpfMother = ? , address = ? , phone1 = ? , phone2 = ? , phone3 = ? , city = ? , state = ? , zip = ? , birthMother = ?, extranetUsername = ?, extranetPassword = ?, enfermeiraID = ?,coletaFeitaPor = ?,obstetraID = ?,hospitalID = ?,dataColeta = ?,dataCrioPreservacao = ?,procPesoInicialUnidade = ?,procViabilidadeCelular = ?,procCd45Cd34Fim = ?,bioArchiveID = ?,cult_micro_bacteria = ?,cult_micro_fungo = ?, enfermeiraCoren = ?, obstetraCRM = ? WHERE clientID = ?
queriesList.INSERT_OBSTETRA_DATA: INSERT INTO obstetra (name,email,crm,state,city,phone1,phone2,address,cep,cpf,contaCorrente,razaoSocial,agencia,banco,secondAddress,secondState,secondCity,secondCep,type,phone3,secretary, parceiro, temDisplay, extranetUsername, extranetPassword,obstetraID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
queriesList.UPDATE_OBSTETRA_DATA: UPDATE obstetra SET name = ?, email = ?, crm = ?, state = ?, city = ?, phone1 = ?, phone2 = ?, address = ?, cep = ?, cpf = ?,contaCorrente = ?,razaoSocial = ?, agencia = ?,banco = ?,secondAddress = ?,secondState = ?,secondCity = ?,secondCep = ?, type = ?, phone3 = ?, secretary = ?, parceiro = ?, temDisplay = ?, extranetUsername = ?, extranetPassword = ? WHERE obstetraID = ?
queriesList.UPDATE_CLIENT_QUESTIONARIO: UPDATE client SET qHepatite = ?, qCHepatite = ?, qVHepatite = ?,qMalaria = ?,qAnemia = ?,qHormonio = ?,qTransSangue = ?,qCancer = ?,qACancer = ?,qPiercing = ?,qExposicaoFluidos = ?,qMedicacao = ?,qMedicacaoQ = ?,qCirurgia = ?,qCompSangue = ?,qVacina = ?,qDoencaCoPuRiDi = ?,qTuberculose = ?,qSIDA = ?,qDrogas = ?,qVenerea = ?,qContatoDrogaSida = ?,qBebida = ?,qDoencaGen = ?,qRecDoacaoSangue = ?,qRecDoacaoSangueMot = ?, qOBS = ? WHERE clientID = ?
queriesList.SELECT_CLIENT_COLETA: SELECT e.NAME as enfermeira, o.NAME as obstetra, h.NAME as hospital, c.coletaFeitaPor, c.dataColeta, c.NAME, e.coren as enfermeiraCoren, o.CRM as obstetraCRM FROM client AS c, enfermeira AS e, obstetra AS o, hospital AS h WHERE c.clientID = ? AND e.enfermeiraID = c.enfermeiraID AND o.obstetraID = c.obstetraID AND h.hospitalID = c.hospitalID
queriesList.UPDATE_CLIENT_COLETA: UPDATE client SET enfermeira = ?, obstetra = ?, hospital = ?, coletaFeitaPor = ?, dataColeta = ? WHERE clientID = ?
queriesList.SELECT_CLIENT_SCUP: SELECT a.dataCrioPreservacao, a.procPesoInicialUnidade, a.procViabilidadeCelular, a.procCd45Cd34Fim, a.bioArchiveID, a.NAME, b.Coren AS enfermeiraCoren, c.crm AS obstetraCRM, '' as cult_micro_bacteria, '' as cult_micro_fungo FROM obstetra c, enfermeira b, client a WHERE a.clientID = ? AND a.enfermeiraID = b.enfermeiraID AND a.obstetraID = c.obstetraID
